name: French Toast with Maple Syrup
steps: In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon.
Heat a skillet or griddle over medium heat and lightly grease with butter.
Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides.
Place the soaked bread on the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
Serve hot with maple syrup, powdered sugar, or fresh fruit.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait with Granola and Berries
steps: In a tall glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and berries.
Repeat the layers until the glass is full, finishing with a layer of berries on top.
Drizzle with honey and serve immediately.

name: Breakfast Burrito with Scrambled Eggs and Salsa
steps: Whisk eggs in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and lightly grease with butter or oil.
Scramble the eggs until cooked, about 3 minutes.
Warm the tortilla in the skillet for 1-2 minutes.
Fill the tortilla with scrambled eggs, cheese, salsa, and sautéed bell peppers.
Roll the tortilla tightly and serve warm.

name: Vegan Tofu Scramble
steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Crumble tofu into the skillet and sprinkle with turmeric.
Add diced bell peppers and onions, and sauté for 5 minutes.
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve.

name: Sausage and Egg Breakfast Casserole
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a baking dish.
Cook sausage in a skillet over medium heat until browned, then set aside.
In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Layer bread cubes in the greased baking dish, followed by cooked sausage and shredded cheese.
Pour the egg mixture over the layers, ensuring even coverage.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until the top is golden and the casserole is set.
Let cool for 5 minutes before serving.
